There is a small airport called Urkunda.
city center will be around 30$ or 2500 Ksh. From the airport a little more (35$, 3000Ksh). Taxi can be a good choise because with public transport you have to change 3 times.
The cheapest way to get to Diani Beach is by local bus-taxis (Matatus).From

town to Likoni Ferry is about Ksh 30. From the Likoni Ferry, take another matatu to Ukunda (30 kms) for about Ksh 60. From Ukunda to Diani Beach, take another matatu about 5 kilometers at the cost of about Ksh 30.

content=Western-style supermarket with all products for daily use. There is also a ATM (Fidelity Bank).

All pubs and bars serve decent food (see drinking).

value: content=Best bar in town right at the beach side. Very common place with movie nights, live bands and a pub quiz once a week.
content=Pub at the Beach Road with cheap beer mostly visited by Kenyans.
